_source.text: A 35-foot, composite-bodied transit bus powered by lithium titanate batteries and two 16-kilowatt Hydrogenics hydrogen fuel cells, the bus runs on clean electric power - with water vapor as its only emission - in a lighter, quieter, and more aerodynamic design that is better suited for today's transportation demands.
